description:
Ready to take a day off from your favorite tee? Then grab yourself a Park Hill Shirt for men, because this clean cut short sleeve shirt is a master in subtle style.

A little texture and background geometric pattern add just enough detail to this lightweight shirt, making it perfect for everything from your lunchdate to your work meeting, and maybe even that early morning round of golf you've been putting off.
name: Prana Park Hill Shirt, Slim - Mens
